attributes.description:
DEMO KIA RIO 1.4 LS 2022 M/T  FOR SALE AT KIA CENTURION IN PRETORIA.

**SUBJECT TO IN-HOUSE FINANCE**

5 Years / Unlimited Km Warranty & 4 Years / 60 000 Km Service Plan.
FEATURES Include:  2 Airbags, Aircon, 16" Alloy Wheels, Auto Head Lights,  Central Locking, Electric Mirrors and Windows, Multi Function Steering, Tow Bar, Radio with Bluetooth and USB Port, Android Auto Car play, Smash and Grab. 


Price excludes delivery and registration fees.
PLEASE NOTE THIS VEHICLE IS AVAILABLE FOR VIEWING AT THE LAZARUS KIA NEW CAR SHOWROOM - ABS, Air bags 2, Auto lights, ISO fix, Brake hazard lights, Power steering, Steering adjustment, Onboard computer, Seats 5, Electric mirror fold, Spare wheel SPACESAVER, Air conditioner, Climate control, Electric windows, Radio, Remote side mirrors, Metallic, Alloy wheels, Fuel UNLEADED, Engine TRANSVERSE INLINE 4, Engine size 1396cc, CO2 137g/Km, Power 73kW@6300, Torque 135Nm@4200, DOHC, 4 VALVES PER CYLINDER, Gears 6, Drive 2, 0-100Km/h 11.5sec, Top speed 176Km/h, Boot capacity 0 litres, Average fuel consumption 0l/km, Service interval 15000km
